data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Assaba, Mauritania.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Assaba, Mauritania
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Assaba to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 819 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Assaba, Mauritania.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Assaba, Mauritania humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Imeraguen people.
Lord, help the people of Assaba, Mauritania to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Assaba, Mauritania will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Assaba, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

location.name: Assaba
location.people_groups_list: Korean, Bedouin, Berabish, Deaf, Zenaga, Bambara
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Korean (2,500), Bedouin, Berabish (68,000), Deaf (46,000), Zenaga (1,000), Bambara (23,000)
